item.title: A Pair of Beomaster 1900 Receivers for Restoration: Unit #2 Wrap Up
item.description:
The second Beomaster 1900 restoration project is finished. After a night of playing music, the Beomaster 1900 was ready for the cabinet to be put back together. The Bass, Treble, and Balance indicator masks were reattached to their slide controls. The touch control panel was then placed onto the cabinet frame, carefully aligning the button actuators with the sensor posts. All touch buttons were tested to ensure functionality before continuing the reassembly...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/a-pair-of-beomaster-1900-receivers-for-restoration-unit-2-wrap-up/
